description: The Cross Hike 2 Mid Gore-Tex is a light and nimble hiker that does the seemingly impossible: keeps you firmly grounded, featherlight and fully protected. Multi-directional deep lugs aggressively bite the ground, while a higher cut ups the ankle support and protection. Ready for your maddest adventures - no terrain or weather is too tough.
name: Salomon Cross Hike 2 Mid GTX - Mens
